scripts.start: npx concurrently "npm run start:api" "npm run start:socket" "npm run start:front"
scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:socket" "npm run dev:front"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:api && npm run install:socket && npm run install:front
scripts.test: npx concurrently "npm run test:api" "npm run test:socket" "npm run test:front"
scripts.lint: npx concurrently "npm run lint:api" "npm run lint:socket" "npm run lint:front"
scripts.clean: npx rimraf node_modules && npx rimraf api-server/node_modules && npx rimraf socket-server/node_modules && npx rimraf front-server/node_modules
scripts.clean:install: npm run clean && npm run install:all
